Summary: Working Nicely for my Dog's Itchy Red Skin
text:
Based on reviews and information I found online I decided to try putting coconut oil on my poodle's dry itchy skin..she was getting yellow flakey areas and pimple/pustules and was itching and licking all the time. In a matter of hours I started to notice a difference (hardly any licking) and by the next day the color of her skin started to normalize. Overnight the redness seemed to return a bit so I'm going to continue applying it. She likes to have it as a treat on her food as well!

I'm SO pleased, and incredibly relieved that I've found something natural that seems to relieve her itching a bit.
